cv-stage.name: pThreshold
cv-stage.parameter-description: Set the brightness threshold that isolates the shiny contacts of a part.

cv-stage.name: pDetail
cv-stage.parameter-description: Minimal size of a detail that should be included in the detected shape.

cv-stage.name: pSymmetricLeftRight
cv-stage.parameter-description: Switch On if parts are symmetric Left/Right (seen in 0° rotation).

cv-stage.name: pSymmetricUpperLower
cv-stage.parameter-description: Switch On if parts are symmetric Upper/Lower (seen in 0° rotation)

cv-stage.name: pThreshold
cv-stage.parameter-description: Threshold brightness for relevant image elements (shiny contacts). Only relevant for asymmetric detection.

cv-stage.name: pMinDetail
cv-stage.parameter-description: Minimum Detail Size that should be considered masked. Only relevant for asymmetric detection.
